parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: (uuid) Databricks account ID of any type. For non-E2 account types, get your account ID from the

parameters.name: network_id
parameters.description: (uuid) Databricks Account API network configuration ID.

200.description: The network configuration was successfully deleted.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

409.description: Request was rejected due a conflict with an existing resource.

delete.description: Deletes a Databricks network configuration, which represents a cloud VPC and its resources. You cannot delete a network that is associated with a workspace.
